long_description: 瑞士萊斯雅頓公認的卓越創造力和技術，是從傳統製錶技術和其準確性得到的啟示。品牌腕錶系列主要集中在高檔腕錶市場, 引領著前沿技術設計力量，著力於準確度的完善。萊斯雅頓優越的設計和行銷模式，贏得了作為一個經典鐘錶品牌的聲譽。 recognized for its exceptional creativity and its technical excellence, louis ardens drawing the inspiration from traditional accuracy of fine watchmaking with today’s technologies. louis ardens focuses on the luxury watch markets by the steep power of confident designs, cutting-edge technologies as well as the perfection of accuracy. louis ardens takes pride in offering exceptional models and won its reputation as a trend setting watch-maker.
